{% comment %} https://github.com/jekyll/minima/blob/master/_includes/custom-head.html Placeholder to allow defining custom head, in principle, you can add anything here, e.g. favicons: 1. Head over to https://realfavicongenerator.net/ to add your own favicons. 2. Customize default _includes/custom-head.html in your source directory and insert the given code snippet. {% endcomment %}
